[i]Right-Hand Man[/i] – When Halvan enters, you may search your library and graveyard with a creature named Brigid. If you do, reveal it and put it into your hand, then shuffle.
[i]Vantage[/i] – At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, untap Halvan.
[i]Fiana Freeblades[/i] – {T}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. If you control a creature named Brigid, they also gain first strike until end of turn.
